website_summaries.verdict: The Sennheiser HD 219s headphone pair delivers clear, defined audio, but at top volumes, it can distort on deep bass tracks.
pros: Inline remote control and microphone for mobile devices
cons: Distorts on deep bass at top volumes

customer_reviews.title: 2 Pairs Broke in a Year's time.  Not Durable.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were just fine when they worked. Bought these in August 2016 used them occasionally and by February 2017, they didn't work properly. Sennheiser sent me a replacement pair under warranty. Very good service however, I used the replacement sent even less than the original and now in August 2017, they don't work at all again. Both Pairs looked brand new when they stopped working. UPDATE: Sennheiser replaced the second broken pair with a newer model after mailing the broken ones back. I highly commend the customer service as they stand behind their product. Adding a star to review to make 3!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: My umpteenth pair, which luckily are still available as the damn cat loves to find the cord and bite thru it. Price is still very good with a bit of hunting. Weight and balance are excellent for me, headset does not slip unless I bed wayyy down. Sound is very very good. In fact, my son, who knows a heck of lot more about headphones, liked mine so much he got me the Sennheiser wireless headset when he added Bluetooth and speaker to my computer. This wired set is tucked away safe from cats for use as a backup pair.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for good headphones but didn't want to pay a lot of money as I am a causal headphone user. I gave my dad some nice Sennheiser headphones that he loves, so I decided to look at the brand after I got some cheap chinese headphones that broke quickly. These headphones are very comfortable and sound really great. They have great volume and good bass. I also like that it has an in-line mic that I can use to skype.
customer_reviews.author: D. Snider

customer_reviews.title: I don't really like the volume slider
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like the volume slider. It's not precise. I prefer the click style of Apple and Amazon ear buds. I tried to use these with an extension cord but the sound was all messed up. I'm guessing I need to use a special cord that works with headphone that use a mic and volume control. I have not research this so I don't know why it did not work with the extension cord. The sound is pretty good otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Doug McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my wife, but I liked the quality. She uses them for hours at a time with no discomfort, which cannot be said of earbuds. I still miss the old Sennheisers with the big yellow foam pads -- probably the most comfortable headphones I ever wore. But tie marches on, and these are great in sound, and in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: William Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long.
customer_reviews.text: It did not last long. I used to have two pairs of this kind and gave them to my friends because I love them and would like to share with friends. Then I bought one more for myself, but this one did not last long. I used for about half year, and the connection began to loosen and only left side sent out sound most of the time. I do not know how to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey_Xie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, horrible mic
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great and are very comfortable for long periods of time. The only issue is the sound quality of the microphone is baaaad. I've used much cheaper headsets that sound great on the other end, but I constantly have people complaining about not being able to hear me, or that I sound like I'm in a tin can with these.
customer_reviews.author: Luke R.

customer_reviews.title: One Side had No Sound After Two Months
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work very well but the sound is more tin-like and not as loud as the other headphones I bought on the same day (Monoprice Hi-Fi Light Weight). UPDATE: Updating my review from four stars to two stars, because one side of the headphones went out after two months, so now sound is only coming out of one side. I only used them at home sitting at my laptop, didn't take them out anywhere! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic sound quality. Can't comment on the mic quality though, never used it. Only downside is how it works, you might need to use the adapter that comes with it depending on what kind of device you're plugging it into, which can be a pain. It can work without it, but your volume would be lower than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair in 2014. It is now end of 2017 and I am having to replace them because new kitten chewed the cord and sound is only coming through one side. Most headphones male my ears sore just from the weight after a while, but these are so lightweight and comfortable. I use this as my ps4 headphone/mic and its sound is so great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for gaming!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for gaming. Great quality and build. Honestly, it's a great investment for $30. They fit super comfortably and don't weigh down on you over time. I went on a 6 hour marathon. Never once felt like I needed to readjust them for comfortability. Sound quality is pretty decent, nothing extraordinary. Then again, they are $30 like I said. Get it - It's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patricio Parrales

customer_reviews.title: Decent electronics, cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but after about 3 years the thin plastic covers over the cushions and headband started peeling. Looks like there is no way to replace them. Sent an email to Sennheiser, never got a reply
customer_reviews.author: iion

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great and Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I got it to specifically to go with my Samsung Gear VR. I needed something with a straight audio plug, and was compact enough to fit in a case. The sound on this is really good, and is comfortable to wear for a extended period of time. It's sound is more than loud enough, and the volume control on the cord is nice. The price was very reasonable for something of this quality. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 years, which isn't bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 3 years with fairly regular use, which isn't bad for the sub-$50 price. Primarily used for conference calls and music, sometimes for 3-4 hours at a time. The sound quality is good (coming from a non-audiophile), and they are lightweight and comfortable. I really like the integrated volume slider, but that's where they eventually failed. Overall I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gadgetgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Good Microphone
customer_reviews.text: These are really great headphones. I started with them on my computer they have very good range for both games and movies. I started to use them with my Samsung Galaxy S5 and really like the microphone option. People can hear me really clearly through it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great office headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are very good headphones for an office or other similar environment where you need to be able to still hear some of what's happening around you. They're lightweight, comfortable to wear for extended periods, sounds is pretty good (not amazing, but pretty good especially for the price), plus the microphone is a good touch.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is fine. The design is sturdy and I like the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this item several times. The sound quality is fine. The design is sturdy and I like the fact that the ear pieces fold. The small design works well for me when using to wait in a doctors office or just on the go. I haven't had them for too long but so far no issues to report.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF M. G.

customer_reviews.title: A no risk headphone pick
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful value! Excellent sound, very crisp highs, tight base...Compared to noise cancelling Bose they actually are pretty close in sound in a quiet room. No noise cancelling at all and have limited value on a plane but that's not what they are positioned for. The mic is clear and functional. Iike how light they feel on and make it easy for long listening sessions. A very good over ear option for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get real loud.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, but sometimes I like to crank up the volume, and these headphones don't get all that loud.
customer_reviews.author: BetoD

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound and use every day
customer_reviews.text: Thank You! Very good sound and use every day. The cord is skinny but has held up to hard daily use. Love Sennheiser :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for phone calls!
customer_reviews.text: I have to make many professional phone calls in the day, and use my Samsung cell phone. These headphones provide EXCELLENT sound quality for my voice, as well as the voice I'm speaking to. Highly recommend. Please note, for music listening, I would purchase a higher quality Sennheiser headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Daisey Love

customer_reviews.title: They block outside noise surprisingly well for such a small ...
customer_reviews.text: They block outside noise surprisingly well for such a small set of earphones. They become uncomfortable to wear after 2-3 hours of use. And while I thought the volume slider would be essential when using it with my phone it actually is not. I would likely buy the less expensive version of these headphones without the volume slider next time.
customer_reviews.author: XVZ

customer_reviews.title: I can hear SO much better than with any other headphones
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in today, just in time for an hour long teleconference. I can hear SO much better than with any other headphones/earbuds I've ever used for meetings. I haven't had to talk in this meeting, so can't comment yet on the mic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend who needed to drown out his noisy coworker. He hasn't complained. Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Vvgamepro

customer_reviews.title: Customer service from this company is amazing. 2 year warrantee
customer_reviews.text: Customer service from this company is amazing. 2 year warrantee. I used the product for over 1 year, and the slider off/on button stopped working. Sennheiser sent me an address label to return the product (for free), and is sending me out new headphones! Awesome !
customer_reviews.author: Chicago professional mom

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Light. Even though the ear covers are smallish they don't pinch my ears like others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sound. Surprising these are Sennheisers.
customer_reviews.text: ZERO low end, very flat, no noise isolation. These are cheap for a reason. Buy a better pair of headphones if you like music. For regular conversation these might be ok.
customer_reviews.author: CodeBlue

customer_reviews.title: very good sound and comfort, usual Sennheiser quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound and comfortable to wear. Usual Sennheiser quality.
customer_reviews.author: J Waits USA

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and very comfortable headphones decent Volume Good Bass im impressed
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and very comfortable headphones decent Volume Good Bass im impressed. These Headphones are meant for tablets and Smart phones and you can not go wrong with them. Pros: Lightweight Comfortable and Great sound. Cons: Permanently attached cord.
customer_reviews.author: roger the reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Light & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable with very good sound. I've found I can't use ear buds for very long after 3 ear infections. I also can't use over the ear phones (big ears). These do a reasonable job of isolation for on-ear use.
customer_reviews.author: SurlyJest

customer_reviews.title: Great product for money.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for money. Good sound and solid construction. I've been using them for 8+ month and cord is intact. Highly recommend,
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Folding would be nicer.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and performance for price. Wish the headphones would fold/collapse for easy transport.
customer_reviews.author: Pine Spruce

customer_reviews.title: Sound is nice. My main concern really is just the cord
customer_reviews.text: Sound is nice. My main concern really is just the cord. Feels like I (or someone else) could just accidentally pull the cord and it would then be useless..
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Seenheiser is the best at this price range
customer_reviews.text: Seenheiser is the best at this price range. Walk right on past all those hyped-up bass-heavy consumer-trap toys: this wonderful German company makes the music sound GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Johnson III

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the quality of this headset. It would be nice to have had a clip to connect to my blouse but I'll not give a negative score for that.... I knew that in advance.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, my son use it to play with his friend and work excellent
customer_reviews.author: mandyboy

customer_reviews.title: Fragile jack.
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of occasional use the jack connections have shorted out. Left ear sound comes and goes, very disappointing. Great sound beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hickson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I love this brand is very confortable and good sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Mary Angélica

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Either this is not compatible with an iPhone or I got a defective device. Sound cuts out every few min and the only way to restore is to unplug and replug in.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, look and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This headset is what I expected, it has an excellent sound, very clear and it's very effective stopping outter sounds. It looks very nice and is very comfortable to use for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricio Antonio Perez Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Bose Soundtrue over ears, or Sennheiser HD 219/229?
customer_reviews.text: Sennheiser fan, I've purchased about 3 sennheiser headphones ranging from these to open ears, to closed ear noise canceling, these were a purchase of spite. Bose has really comfortable over the ear padded headphones with good sound...for $150. These are better, the sound quality and comfort are similar, the fit is the same as the Bose, and they're $100 cheaper, if you're on the fence and just discovered these, get them instead. If you already have the Bose, enjoy the lack of mobile functionality. Side by side comparison done in store.
customer_reviews.author: DLAnthoney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them, she uses for talking on the cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Teemozon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Have had no issues at all. But with a low volume feels like you are hearing something from out of a well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for air travel
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for air travel, I was using to listen to podcasts (nexus 6 with podcast addict app) on my 12 hour flight, very comfortable, good sound quality, you can stop and start podcast without taking out the phone...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good lightweight headphones, especially considering the price. The only drawback is that headband could have been a bit tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle raven

customer_reviews.title: the headphones simply became useless and lay in a
customer_reviews.text: The cable stop working after few months, the headphones simply became useless and lay in a drawer
customer_reviews.author: Laura Varisco

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way too small, can't use for my job. If you wprk in sound studios, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nixon the Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Fit is comfortable, sound is good
customer_reviews.text: Loud Co-workers no longer a problem. Fit is comfortable, sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: All about the Dog

customer_reviews.title: It is true what they say, the sound is not all that loud. Good mic
customer_reviews.text: It is true what they say, the sound is not all that loud. Good mic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound quality at this price point! Bass and treble are actually stronger than I thought they would be. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I have been on a never-ending hunt for comfortable headphones. I have headphones on for long periods of time when writing papers these don't disappoint but I do prefer the over-the-ear headphones. Overall for the price and the style they are very comfortable for anyone that wears glasses and needs to wear them for long periods of time. I highly recommend to anyone on a budget
customer_reviews.author: nicole wasson

customer_reviews.title: Look good and sounds good
customer_reviews.text: I have always trusted Sennheiser headphones to produce the perfect sound. This headphone doesn't disappoint even though of the price and meant to use a phone. Audio good for a on ear and taking in calls are clear. Wind noise still passes between the headphone and ear. Simple single push button for calls, forward and rewind. With a sliding volume control. The cans swivel so you can lay the headphone flat, wish that it could've a folding feature. Nice to have when your out wearing business attire.
customer_reviews.author: N Vo

customer_reviews.title: Very good headset
customer_reviews.text: These work great and the sound quality is excellent. These are a little more expensive but worth the price. ***I have had these for over 6 months now and so far they are some of the best headphones I've had. They have great quality sound and work better than I ever expected. I will definitely be buying me another pair soon. I have put these in places that I have broken most other headphones and these just keep working ****
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear sound in the headphones. People on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear sound in the headphones. People on the other end say I sound 5 by 5. Light and compact. Sennheiser quality.
customer_reviews.author: HeavyDee296

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are excellent with good qualities and fulfills all needs what we expect.Excellent products.preferabally excellent. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Hardik Shah

customer_reviews.title: not good for someone with a big head
customer_reviews.text: Sort of small, not good for someone with a big head. Might work well with women and children and no insults are intended by this. Sound quality is typical of Sennheiser which IMO is very much suited to rock and roll and rock and roll only. Cord is flimsy but overall not a bad stopgap if you need something to control your phone with a mic.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounded headphones, don't go as loud as i want but are sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Bronkhorst

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: Heard a lot about Senneiser headphones. These just didn't work for me. I struggle with earbuds so I was hoping these would meet my needs. The plastic was uncomfortable. Sound was "Ok".
customer_reviews.author: Baiba PG

customer_reviews.title: It does not have the sound I am use to ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not have the sound I am use to with my other Sennheiser headphones in similar retail price range. Low ranges are missing. I believe I am well into the "cut in" phase. The sound has improved since purchase. I would not buy this particular pair again. I have not tried the mic.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, their OK. Sound is decent--wouldn't use these phones for listening to music for long periods. Build quality is bit weak.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. The sound is very good, The bass are great and the manual controller it is very practical for the cellulars.
customer_reviews.author: ORLANDO

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: hVery pleased with this product. It has good sound quailty for the cost. The headphones fit comfortably on the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Volume is a Problem.
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of this headphone is excellent. The highest volume setting is too low. I have above average hearing as it was just tested. The volume adjustment is hard to set. It is very difficult to adjust without removing the headphone from your head.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckster

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This are ladies' headphones. Too small for an adult man. Sound is average, nothing out of the ordinary, it does have sound leakage. Cable is ridiculously short, not suitable for a desktop use.
customer_reviews.author: Ale PY

customer_reviews.title: Son is happy with the headphones
customer_reviews.text: Son is happy with the headphones. A teenage boy enjoys his music and the parents don't have to listen also!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ME - Better Alternatives.......
customer_reviews.text: I wished I listened to the other reviews; at around $50.00 the competition is too fierce. Go with the Jabra Revo corded for around the same price. I was looking for a mic, portable, good-sound, reputable brand and low-price. I don't think Sennheiser should have put their name on these, just not loud enough. I also bought $12 JVC Flats (HA-S160-B), GREAT, GREAT, GREAT DEAL! At $12.
customer_reviews.author: Page Villaluna

customer_reviews.title: ... person at radio shack that this head phone is better than beets
customer_reviews.text: was told by a sales person at radio shack that this head phone is better than beets, however not able to hear other person well, but ok for price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bezenek

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced garbage
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. It's hard to feel the "punchy bass" unless you press the very looses earpieces against your ears, which isn't what headphones are meant for.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought from a good company.
customer_reviews.text: for the price i could have found a better pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: joseph seidle

customer_reviews.title: Best headset ever
customer_reviews.text: Cord is 4ft long. Sound is great, mic works really well for calls- no static or problems with my friends hearing me. You barely notice you're wearing a headset. It's on ear but very comfortable, comparible to boise in terms of comfort. I have tried other headsets in the same price range such as HP and steelserries, both which would hurt after a couple hours. There is some noise cancellation but it's not perfect. The jack is straight, and has no elbow. Probably my only complaint as I use it with a PC. I really think this is the best on ear headset I've ever owned/tried.
customer_reviews.author: S. Witts

product_meta.title: Sennheiser HD 219 S Headphones with Integrated Microphone for Smartphones, Black
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingImmerse yourself in vibrant sound and punchy bass with Sennheiser's HD 219s universal headset for Smartphones. It features a smart in-line remote control with integrated microphone and volume slider, making it easy to take/end calls, play/pause music, change tracks (with compatible devices), and adjust the volume level, while listing to your favorite music tracks on the move. Powerful neodymium magnets for stereo sound provide an excellent audio performance and the closed on-ear headphone design blocks outside noise. Suitable for virtually all Smartphone brands in the market featuring a 3.5mm headphone jack. This headphone's combination of features and audio performance make it an exceptional value
feature_bullets: Universal fit - compatible with virtually any smart phone in the market featuring 3.5mm headphone jack, including Android, Windows Mobile, RIM (Blackberry) and iOS devices.Connectivity Technology: Wired
Lightweight, on ear design with single sided cable is extremely comfortable for long listening sessions.
Vibrant sound with punchy bass - high-output neodymium magnets for stereo sound with powerful bass response

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars215 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
